text: The is the upper house of the National Diet of Japan. The House of Representatives is the lower house. The House of Councillors has 242 members who each serve six-year terms, two years longer than those of the House of Representatives. Councillors must be at least 30 years old, compared with 25 years old in the House of Representatives. ==Presidents== ==Other websites== * House of Councillors Website (in English) * House of Councillors internet TV - Official site (in Japanese) Category:Politics of Japan Japan
title: House of Councillors (Japan)
